title: 115_hr1761
content: The Act may be cited as the "Protecting Against Child Exploitation Act of 2017" and addresses sexual exploitation of children. Section 2251 of title 18, United States Code, is amended to address the sexual exploitation of children, including actions such as employing minors for sexually explicit conduct, producing visual depictions of minors engaged in such conduct, transmitting live depictions, having minors assist in such conduct, and transporting minors across state lines for these purposes. The amendment to Section 2251 of title 18, United States Code, addresses the sexual exploitation of children, including actions such as transporting minors across state lines for the production of sexually explicit visual depictions and permitting minors to engage in such conduct. Parents or guardians who knowingly allow minors to participate in sexually explicit conduct for the production of visual depictions will be punished accordingly. The amendment to Section 2251 of title 18, United States Code prohibits the production or transmission of visual depictions of sexually explicit conduct involving minors using interstate or foreign commerce. The amendment to Section 2251 of title 18, United States Code prohibits the production or transmission of visual depictions of sexually explicit conduct involving minors using interstate or foreign commerce. This includes materials that have been transported in or affecting interstate or foreign commerce by any means, including by computer, and any part of the offense occurring within the United States or its territories. No criminal charge may be brought against electronic communication service providers or remote computing service providers unless they intentionally transmit a visual depiction of a minor engaged in sexually explicit conduct with actual knowledge. Section 2258B of title 18, United States Code is amended to provide limited liability for individuals responding to search warrants or legal process. The House of Representatives passed this amendment on May 25, 2017.
